mcq.statement: Which book by Allama Iqbal was translated into Turkish by Dr. Ali Ganjeli?
mcq.one_liner: The book by Allama Iqbal that was translated into Turkish by Dr. Ali Ganjeli is **Payam-e-Mashriq**.
